sources.title: Ants in Your Pantry (1945)
sources.description: This one has lots of what Terrytoons are notorious for: cycles! And cycles of the commonest kind: ants harvesting and a baby factory! It also has a voluptuous Queen Ant and a sweetly delivered punchline which may make it worth your trouble. Withheld from television release; presumably because it leaves too many "birds-and-bees" questions unanswered for tiny tots (and their beleaguered parents). Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/ants-in-your-pantry-1945/

metadata.Plot: This story follows the daily activities of ants. The beautiful Queen Ant arrives, and immediately goes up to the maternity ward. Will there be lots of new baby ants before long?
metadata.Writer: John Foster, Tom Morrison, Paul Terry
